resources.string:
Thanks to everyone who has donated Your support is appreciated and helps support the app.
 See http://www.cadpage.org/financial-support for more details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 Multiple Fixes for Existing Locations and Issues
 New Locations:
 New District: Lewisville, TX
 New District: Jefferson County, MO
 
 Fixes:
 Force close shutting down Cadpage
 App crashes with any attempt to use Erie County, PA
 Parsing problem with Jefferson County, NY location
 Parsing problem with Humble COunty, TX
 Parsing problem with Alexander County, NC
 Parsing problem with Frederick County, MD
 Fixed parsing problem with Sonoma County, CA
 Parsing problem with Humble County, TX
 Parsing problem with Hamilton County, OH
 Parsing problem with Marshall County, IN
